attributes.title: no❤️
attributes.review: i absolutely hate this app. i downloaded it and i had to put in my phone number so i did. then immediately after people were texting me hate messages and harassing me. i hate this app and it should be taken down immediately!

attributes.title: I can’t believe this!
attributes.review: This app is not informational! The organization of the app is uncontrollably disgusting. It’s not set up properly. I am in utter disgust of how uninformative this app is.

attributes.review: I honestly can’t believe this is still in the App Store! This sorry excuse for an app is upsetting me and my homegirls. I will not be keeping it.
